sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import Input from '../../UI/Input'
import styles from './MealItemForm.module.css'

const MealItemForm = (props) => {
    return (
        <>
            <form className={styles.form}>
                <Input 
                lable="Amount" 
                input={{ 
                    id:'amout' + props.id,
                    type:'number',
                    max:'9',
                    min:'1',
                    step:'1',
                    defaultValue:'1'
                    } }/>
                <button>+Add</button>
            </form>
        </>
    )
}

export default MealItemForm
